Title: NHRC receives 406,088 complaints on sexual violence against minors in October
Summary: The National Human Rights Commission (NHRC) reported a total of 406,088 human rights complaints and more than 160 monitored incidents of violations across Nigeria in October . According to its Human Rights Situation Dashboard presented in Abuja on Monday, the commission said .

Title: 300 forest guards appeal to Otu over unpaid salaries
Summary: 300 forest guards employed by the Cross River State Forestry Commission in 2024 have appealed to Governor Bassey Otu to intervene in the delay in their salary payments .

Title: 45-year-old begs Nigerians for support, seeks N35m for kidney transplant.
Summary: Mrs Salewa Arije, 45, has appealed to Nigerians and philanthropists across the world to come to her rescue . Arije suffers from a known history of hypertensive neuropathy . She hails from Ilaje Local Council Area of Ondo State .

Title: Kano partners FG to unlock health population
Summary: Kano State Ministry of Health, in collaboration with the Presidential Initiative for Unlocking the Healthcare Value Chain (PVAC), with support from the UK-FCDO Lafiya Programme, has organized a two-day Validation Workshop for the Tom Brown Business Case .

Title: $1trn economy can’t be achieved without aviation industry
Summary: Federal Government cannot achieve its ambitious $1 trillion economy without the development of the country's aviation industry . $1trn economy can’t be achieved without aviation industry, the Federal Government says .

Title: Atalanta sacks coach Ivan Juric after poor start to season
Summary: Atalanta sack Ivan Juric after losing 3-0 to newly-promoted Sassuolo on Sunday . The club have lost 11 of their 11 Serie A games so far this season . The Italian club have not won any of their last 11 matches .

Title: Alleged Christian genocide: No cause for alarm over Trump’s threats – Egba High Chief
Summary: An Egba High Chief, Chief Oluyinka Kufile, dismissed growing concerns over alleged diplomatic tension between Nigeria and the United States of America . The U.S. President, Donald Trump, has threatened to “attack Nigeria” over alleged persecution of Christians . The Alake of Egbaland sets to celebrate 20

Title: Tinubu addressing development commissions funding challenges – Momoh
Summary: President Bola Tinubu is looking into the funding challenges facing the development commissions in the six geopolitical zones and the Niger Delta Development Commission, NDDC .

Title: Digital economy will contribute 21% of GDP in 2027 – Communication Minister
Summary: The Minister of Communication, Innovations, and Digital Economy, Mr. Bosun Tijani, says the digital economy sector will contribute 21 percent of the nation’s GDP by 2027 .

Title: Trump threatens BBC with $1bn lawsuit over speech edit
Summary: Trump threatens BBC with $1bn lawsuit over speech edit . "President Trump will continue to hold accountable those who traffic in lies, deception, and fake news"
